about: I am a dedicated and versatile Full Stack Developer with a strong foundation in Data Structures and Algorithm, also having hands-on experience in building robust and user-focused applications using modern web technologies. I have developed projects and interactive web tools that deliver seamless user experiences.  Beyond my professional work, I enjoy playing problem-solving puzzles like chess and sudoku, which sharpen my analytical skills. I am also deeply interested in spirituality, constantly seeking insights that inspire balance and personal growth.
